 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 1.3 - ADAPTABLE
IDENTIFY PURPOSE(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

In content implemented using markup languages, the purpose of User Interface
Components, icons, and regions can be programmatically determined.

These websites...

Create content that can be presented in different ways (for example simpler
layout) without losing information or structure.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
The links in the navigation of a website are marked up so that users can add
their own icons. I still don't really understand
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/identify-purpose.html#examples] Web
Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 27 February 2020 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2020/WD-WCAG22-20200227/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/) 

Unsubscribe [https://dwcag.org/unsubscribe]
